item.title: About Us
item.description:
Do Choti is a Almora Uttarakhand, India based non-profit, non-religious, non- political organization, run by volunteers. “Do Choti” is more than just being an organization, its a motivating factor, a symbol of a brighter future, shaping by making miniature positive differences in the life of individuals.

Founded on 21st-June-2016, with a vision for a world with Educated, Aware, Empowered and Responsible individuals, “Do Choti” draws its name from the iconic “Do Choti” (english - ‘Two Braids’) of the school going girl, smiling, hopping there way to school, helping & caring for all, and spreading happiness, they are adored by all be it elderly or young. “Do Choti”(english - ‘Two Peaks’) also represents two peaks (of the mighty Himalaya). Two peaks with a rising sun between them.

We at “Do Choti” endeavor to spread the message to be as the rising sun; the modern age Prometheus; empowering masses - rising, shining, showering its pleasant warmth and light everywhere, while being as humble and loveable as the school going girls with “Do Choti” .

Our Members

I.C.Joshi

Settler and Secretary

Vidhi Joshi

Founder and Managing Trustee

Parimit Lohani

Member since 2016

Vaidic Joshi

Trustee

Bhumika Garbyal

Member since 2016

Member since 2016

Member since 2016

Aditya Pratap Singh

Member since 2016

item.title: Disclaimer
item.description:
Disclaimer :The information contained in this website is for general information purposes only. The information is provided by dochoti.in and while we endeavour to keep the information up to date and correct, we make no representations or warranties of any kind, express or implied, about the completeness, accuracy, reliability, suitability or availability with respect to the website or the information, products, services, or related graphics contained on the website for any purpose. Any reliance you place on such information is therefore strictly at your own risk. In no event will we be liable for any loss or damage including without limitation, indirect or consequential loss or damage, or any loss or damage whatsoever arising from loss of data or profits arising out of, or in connection with, the use of this website. Through this website you are able to link to other websites which are not under the control of dochoti.in. We have no control over the nature, content and availability of those sites. The inclusion of any links does not necessarily imply a recommendation or endorse the views expressed within them. Every effort is made to keep the website up and running smoothly. However, dochoti.in takes no responsibility for, and will not be liable for, the website being temporarily unavailable due to technical issues beyond our control.s

Cookies Policy

We are using cookies to provide statistics that help us give you the best experience of our site. You can find out more or switch them off if you prefer. However, by continuing to use the site without changing settings, you are agreeing to our use of cookies.

item.title: Financial Contribution
item.description:
Direct Bank Transfer (NEFT/RTGS/Cash Transfer)

For Indian Passport Holders

  • Bank: ICICI Bank
  • In name of: Do Choti
  • A/c No: 091205001072
  • A/c Type: Corporate Account
  • Bank Address: MALL ROAD, NEAR GURURANI AUTOMOBILES , BAKSHIKHOLA,ALMORA, UTTARAKHAND - 263601
  • IFSC Code: ICIC0000912
  • MICR Code: 263 229 102
By Cheque/Draft

Please make your cheque/draft in the name of “Do Choti” and send it to Do Choti, Amba Bhawan, Narsingh Bari, Almora, Uttarakhand-263601<

Online Portal

For Indian Passport Holders/Indian Citizens

Please Note:
  • For receipt purpose, please send
    • your name,
    • amount,
    • email ID,
    • tel no. and
    • address to donation@dochoti.in , with
    • date & mode of transfer,
    • transfer code/ cheque number,
    • Bank’s name and location with last 4 digits of your account number.
  • As per Indian Tax Laws, it is mandatory to have full name and address of a contributor else its treated as anonymous and is subject to taxation in the hands of Do Choti.
  • In case you have a foreign address, we’ll need a copy of your passport as advised by the Foreign Contribution Regulation Act, 2010.
  • For any queries, write to us on contact@dochoti.in or call on 080-4116-2467

item.title: Frequently Asked Questions
item.description:
View in Rich Text Format

What is Do Choti?

“Do Choti is a Almora Uttarakhand, India based non-profit, non-religious, non- political organization, run by volunteers.“Do Choti is more than just being an organization, its a motivating factor, a symbol of a brighter future, shaping by making miniature positive differences in the life of individuals.

Why the name “Do Choti?”

The iconic “Do Choti (english translation - ‘Two Braids’) of the school going girl, smiling, hopping there way to school, helping & caring for all, and spreading happiness, they are adored by all be it elderly or young.

“Do Choti (english translation - ‘Two Peaks’) also represents two peaks (of the mighty Himalaya). Two peaks with a rising sun between them.

We at “Do Choti endeavor to spread the message to be as the rising sun; the modern age Prometheus; empowering masses - rising, shining, showering its pleasant warmth and light everywhere, while being as humble and loveable as the school going girls with “Do Choti .

What is Do Choti’s Vision?

We envision a world with Educated, Aware, Empowered and Responsible individuals.

Educated : Education is the stepping stone

Aware : Must be aware about surrounding, how things are moving, the bigger picture.

Empowered : Knowledge is power ..power to shape ones life

Responsible : be Responsible

What is Do Choti’s Mission?

Our mission is to ensure education, livelihood, health and overall development of the individuals, thus empowering the individuals.

When was “Do Choti founded? Is Do Choti a registered charity in India?

Do Choti was founded on 21-June-2016. It is registered under ….

Where does Do Choti work?

We have just begin our journey, to start with we will be working in Almora Uttarakhand, India, and will gradually expand the work to other parts of Nation.

Where can I find the trust deed?

You can access it here.

Does Do Choti staff get paid?

No. All directors and staff members are volunteers. We strongly believe that together we can make a real difference to the society, hence despite our personal and professional commitments, we donate our time and energy to the organization.

How can I be sure that the money I send is managed correctly? Who audits Do Choti’s accounts?

We have a transparent system of handling the money. All the transactions are done electronically or by cheques, we do not make cash based transactions thus leaving an audit trail. All the invoices and total funds received are maintained at our website accessible in public domain. The balace sheets will be audited by a registered Charted Accontant every 5 years as mention in the trust deed.

How can I be sure my payment through the Internet is safe?

You can be assured that all transactions on our site are safe. Online security is a primary concern and that is why we have partnered with ICICI bank to provide safe gateway. We do not store your banking information.

Can I donate by credit card?

Yes, “Do Choti accepts donations via paytm You can donate here.

Do I get tax exemptions when I donate to Do Choti?

Not yet, we are under process of getting a 80G non-profit organization status. – Alt – Yes. As Do Choti is a 80G non-profit organization, your donations are tax deductible. When you donate to us, you will receive a receipt acknowledging your donation that can be used for tax-filing purposes.

How much of the contribution I send is tax exempted?

All donations to World Vision are tax exempted under section 80G of the Income Tax Act. Our receipt carries this message and the receipt will suffice for claiming tax exemption. The tax rebate is 50% of your contribution to us.

What does Do Choti do with my one time donation?

Unless you specify which project(s) you wish the money to go to, Do Choti will put your donation in a general fund. We do not use any portion of your donation to cover our operational expenses.

Does Do Choti have permission of the Government to receive donations from foreign countries?

No. However Indian citizens abroad can donate to us. We are working on setting up permisions.

May I add your link to my Home Page / Website?

Yes of course and please do!! You may also add our Do Choti logo or icon to your website, Twitter, Facebook, etc.

Where can I find more information about Do Choti?

Please take some time to browse this website and do not hesitate to contact us if you still have questions.

How can I contact Do Choti if I have questions?

You may get our contact information from here.

item.title: Gift A sweater
item.description:
Duration Progress
Diwali 2016   
100%

Detailed Report

We at Do Choti distribute sweaters to school going kids (going to Govt. primary schools) from villages in Almora, Uttarakhand, India.

Almora being a hill stations ins foothills of Himalaya, the temperature goes below 0ºC during winters.

A small contribution of ₹250/- will make a considerable difference.

item.title: Our Projects
item.description: This page lists all the projects currently undertaken and those already completed by Us.

item.title: Project Report: Gift A Sweater - Diwali 2016
item.description:
We at Do Choti distributed sweaters to 42 students in two primary schools in Almora. The total cost was ₹ 8,820/- .

Financial Report (Members Only)

Email Communications :

item.title: दो चोटी
item.description:
“दो चोटी” शब्द सुनते ही हँसती-खिलखिलती स्कूल जाती छोटी-बड़ी बच्चियों का चेहरा सामने आता है, जो चारो ओर प्यार, खुशियाँ बिखेरती, सबका सम्मान करती हैं और सबकी प्यारी दुलारी होती हैं |

“दो चोटी” दो पहाड़ियो की भी याद दिलाती है, जिनके बीच से दुनिया के अंधकार दूर कर प्रकाश फैलता हुआ सूर्या उदय होता है जो जन-जन में नव-जीवन भरता है | “दो चोटी” हिमालय की चोटियो की भी याद दिलाती है जो उज्वल, अटल और मनमोहक हैं |

“दो चोटी” चाहे वो उगते सूरज की हो, चाहे हिमालय की अथवा हँसती-गाती स्कूल जाती बच्चियों की - सभी चारो ओर प्रसन्नता, प्रेम, सौहार्द्य फैलती हैं | हिमालय की तरह अपने लक्ष्या मे अडिग, उगते सूरज की तरह ज्ञान का प्रकाश फैलती तथा बच्चियों की तरह निश्छल प्रेमवयी व विनम्रा, इसी प्रकार की शिक्षा देना “दो चोटी” का उद्देश्य है |

item.title: Do Choti
item.description:

We at “Do Choti” endeavor to spread the message to be as the rising sun; the modern age Prometheus; empowering masses - rising, shining, showering its pleasant warmth and light everywhere, while being as humble and loveable as the school going girls with “Do Choti” .
